altername_name: Out of Galaxy: Gin no Koushika
name: Out of Galaxy: Gin no Koshika
overview: The original piece of work from Leiji Matsumoto, comes from an idea had by the author whilst he was working on older titles such as Galaxy Express 999 and Space Pirate Captain Herlock. The storyline is set in , and the tale commences on 9th September, 2099, focusing on two main characters: You Haguro and Hajime Umino. The two protagonists travel through space and time with the aim of prevent the destruction of the world.
